VXLIB Function Reference

Fast Corners

OpenVX Function Description

  • Computes the corners in an image using a method based upon FAST9 algorithm.

OpenVX Function Reference Page

  • https://www.khronos.org/registry/vx/specs/1.1/html/dd/d22/group__group__vision__function__fast.html

VXLIB API

  • VXLIB_fastCorners_i8u : Input image is U8 format
    • Calls internally: VXLIB_fastCornersDetect_i8u
    • Calls internally: VXLIB_fastCornersScore_i8u
    • Calls internally: VXLIB_fastCornersNMS_i8u
